long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Finding the Qibla direction with our extension has become even easier and more convenient. You can now select your country and city to accurately determine the Qibla direction. The extension displays the Qibla direction in degrees and includes a built-in compass that shows the direction in real-time.

Here’s how it works:

Select your country and city – Use the easy-to-navigate selection menu to specify your location.
Get precise Qibla direction data – The extension automatically calculates and displays the Qibla direction in degrees for your location.
Use the built-in compass – Our compass visually indicates the Qibla direction, making the orientation process quick and easy.
With our extension, you'll never have to guess which way to pray again. Just select your city and country, and follow the compass directions.
